thread.title: Wall St drops as healthcare slides, oil climbs

title: Wall St drops as healthcare slides, oil climbs
text:
Wall St drops as healthcare slides, oil climbs Monday, April 30, 2018 - 01:12
Wall Street fell on Monday as healthcare stocks slid and rising oil prices and a looming deadline for exemptions to U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs weighed on investor sentiment. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Wall Street fell on Monday as healthcare stocks slid and rising oil prices and a looming deadline for exemptions to U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs weighed on investor sentiment.
